0110111110100100 1111000111110111 1 -> sum: 0110000110011100, cout: 1

0010101011101011 0000100000100000 0 -> sum: 0011001100001011, cout: 0
1011100101000100 1110110010010100 0 -> sum: 1010010111011000, cout: 1
0111111101111011 0101000001111000 1 -> sum: 1100111111110100, cout: 0
1111111000110111 1111000011101001 1 -> sum: 1110111100100001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
